Package it.polito.dp2.BIB

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ArticleReader
    An interface for reading information about an article in the BIB system.
    BibReader
    An interface for reading information about the BIB system.
    BookChapterReader
    An interface for reading information about a book chapter in the BIB system.
    BookReader
    An interface for reading information about a book in the BIB system.
    IssueReader
    An interface for reading information about a journal issue in the BIB system.
    ItemReader
    An interface for accessing the main information associated to a bibliography item.
    JournalReader
    An interface for reading information about a journal in the BIB system.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BibReaderFactory
    Defines a factory API that enables applications to obtain one or more objects implementing the BibReader interface.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BibReaderException
    An exception thrown if an implementation of BibReader cannot be created.
  • Error Summary 
    Error Description
    FactoryConfigurationError
    Thrown if the implementation of the concrete factory is not available or cannot be instantiated.
